text: Stimuli of Haxby dataset are now available. Should we fetch them ? integrate them in an example ?
title: [Enhancement] Haxby stimuli

text: it's small. Sounds good to me;

> No, this is purely informative. The orginal sequence of presentation of
> the pictures is unknown. We know which category of picture is presented
> but not the exact picture.

OK. Not as good, but still useful for pretty slides in presentations.
Yeah as far as I know this dataset is good for "decoding". But knowing what the stimuli look like can never harm
10 Mo. We can fetch them on demand with a kwarg (fetch_stimuli=True ?).
No, this is purely informative. The orginal sequence of presentation of the pictures is unknown. We know which category of picture is presented but not the exact picture.
